description: Leader of the Varia and Vongola IX`s apparent son. Told by his mother that he was the IX`s real son, Xanxus started to hate the IX after finding out that he was adopted. Furthermore, after finding out that someone without the Vongola bloodline cannot become a Vongola boss, and that the IX was going to appoint Tsuna as the next boss instead, he went berserk.
name: Xanxus
